description:
No more side-to-side play, nothing but satisfyingly smooth dropper actuation. If you're adding a dropper lever or replacing a janky stock lever, the Loam Lever is pure luxury. Simply push on the contoured thumb pad and the machined aluminum lever rides on a sealed cartridge bearing, delivering glassy calm ups and downs. Yeah, it’s that good.

  • Tacky rubber thumb pad reduces slippage and wears well
  • Sealed cartridge bearings and additional seal around the pivot keep things smooth in all conditions
  • If you’re running I-Spec EV and want to streamline your cockpit, this kit connects the Loam lever to the left side’s brake clamp, meaning 1 less clamp on your bars
  • Compatible with all cable-actuated droppers
  • Designed for 1x drivetrains, so no shifters on the left
name: PNW Components Loam Lever Dropper Post Lever Kit (I-Spec EV)
